ow.routing.chord
クラス FingerTable

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.chord.FingerTable

public final class FingerTable
extends java.lang.Object

Chord's finger table.

コンストラクタの概要
FingerTable(int idSizeInByte, RoutingAlgorithm algorithm, IDAddressPair selfIDAddressPair, boolean aggressiveJoining)
          Create a new finger table.
 
メソッドの概要
 IDAddressPair get(int k)
          Return an entry.
 int numOfDifferentEntries()
          Returns the number of nodes which are different from this node itself.
 boolean put(IDAddressPair newEntry)
          Put the specified entry to this finger table.
 boolean put(IDAddressPair newEntry, int largestIndex)
          Put the specified entry to this finger table from finger[i] down to possibly finger[1].
 void remove(ID target)
          Remove the specified entry from this finger table and fill the blanks with the appropriate alternative entry.
 IDAddressPair set(int k, IDAddressPair entry)
          Set an entry
 
クラス java.lang.Object から継承されたメソッド
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

コンストラクタの詳細

FingerTable

public FingerTable(int idSizeInByte,
                   RoutingAlgorithm algorithm,
                   IDAddressPair selfIDAddressPair,
                   boolean aggressiveJoining)
Create a new finger table.

パラメータ:
size - the number of bits in an ID.
メソッドの詳細

get

public IDAddressPair get(int k)
Return an entry.

パラメータ:
k - index (1 <= k <= size).

set

public IDAddressPair set(int k,
                         IDAddressPair entry)
Set an entry

パラメータ:
k - index (1 <= k <= size).

put

public boolean put(IDAddressPair newEntry)
Put the specified entry to this finger table.

戻り値:
true if an entry was updated.

put

public boolean put(IDAddressPair newEntry,
                   int largestIndex)
Put the specified entry to this finger table from finger[i] down to possibly finger[1].

戻り値:
true if an entry was updated.

remove

public void remove(ID target)
Remove the specified entry from this finger table and fill the blanks with the appropriate alternative entry.

numOfDifferentEntries

public int numOfDifferentEntries()
Returns the number of nodes which are different from this node itself. Note that this ratio will be roughly propotional to log(number of nodes).
